tasks.title: Configure Lemon Squeezy Webhook
tasks.description: Webhook configuration enables Lemon Squeezy to notify your app of payment events (order_created, subscription_created). Without this, users won't get access after payment.
steps: Go to Lemon Squeezy dashboard -> Settings -> Webhooks
verification: Test purchase triggers webhook (use test mode)

tasks.title: Set up Production Database
tasks.description: Production database is required for deployment. Local SQLite won't work in serverless environments.
steps: Create a Turso database at https://turso.tech
Copy the database URL and auth token
Run prisma db push to create tables
verification: Can connect to production database from local

tasks.title: Install Docker for Local Development
tasks.description: Docker is needed for running PostgreSQL locally during development.

tasks.title: Configure OAuth Providers
tasks.description: OAuth providers enable social login. Google and GitHub are configured in code but need credentials.
steps: Create Google OAuth credentials at console.cloud.google.com
Create GitHub OAuth app at github.com/settings/developers
verification: All four OAuth environment variables are set
Google login works in local development
GitHub login works in local development

tasks.title: Set up Analytics
tasks.description: Analytics helps track user behavior and product usage. Can be deferred until after MVP launch.
verification: Page views appear in Posthog dashboard
